thread.title: Ground News - Rain, floods dampen tourist arrivals during holiday season in Tiruchi
thread.title_full: Ground News - Rain, floods dampen tourist arrivals during holiday season in Tiruchi

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Rain, floods dampen tourist arrivals during holiday season in Tiruchi
text:
Summary by Ground News The arrival of domestic tourists and devotees to the religious sites witnessed a marginal dip during the Vaikunta Ekadasi festival and the year end holiday season in Tiruchi. The day of the opening of Paramapathavaasal, the highlight of the festival, used to record the highest number of devotees. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Hindu Lean Left High Factuality Independent: The Hindu Group Rain, floods dampen tourist arrivals during holiday season in Tiruchi The arrival of domestic tourists and devotees to the religious sites witnessed a marginal dip during the Vaikunta Ekadasi festival and the year end holiday season in Tiruchi apparently due to floods in Chennai and a few southern districts
